examples: They went fishing in a small boat.
She sailed around the world in a sailboat.
The boat was floating on the calm water.
Eles foram pescar em um barco pequeno.
Ela navegou ao redor do mundo em um veleiro.
O barco estava flutuando sobre a água calma.

suggested: Why don't oysters donate to charity? Because they are shellfish and don't like to share their 'boat'!
Seeing an abandoned 'boat' adrift in the water can evoke a sense of sadness and loneliness.
I get so angry when people litter and pollute our oceans, harming marine life and damaging 'boats'.
Did you know that the world's oldest intact 'boat' is a dugout canoe dating back to around 8,000 BCE?
The salty scent of the sea and the fresh breeze as you sail on a 'boat'.
The gentle rocking motion and the feel of the water against the hull when you're on a 'boat'.
Sharing moments on a 'boat' with friends or family can create lasting memories and strengthen bonds.
